body:
> Something we did again in the Cloudflare fork is expose the serialized CH in the ConnectionState, but I don't think anything that low-level fits in the standard library. Or did you have anything else in mind?

It's not unprecedented. [`x509.Certificate`](https://golang.org/pkg/crypto/x509/#Certificate) has a bunch of `Raw*` fields. Another option would be exposing all parameters/extensions that the package is aware of and then using a single field for all unknown extensions.
